welcomeMessage.title: Welcome to Flashcall
welcomeMessage.description: Flashcall is a platform where clients can avail consultation services from consultants. This privacy policy applies to clients, consultants, and all users of our platform, and is part of our Terms of Use. By using our platform, you agree that your personal information that you provide directly to us or that we collect through your use of the platform, may be transferred to and stored in the United States and handled as described in this Policy.

informationProvideByYou.title: Information You Provide Through Your Account
informationProvideByYou.description: This is information that you provide to us through text fields, such as your name, payment information and benefits. The information we collect differs depending on if you make an account, become a subscriber, or become a consultant.
informationProvideByYou.endingPara: You may also sign up using a Facebook, Instagram or Google account. We will ask permission to access basic information from your Facebook, Instagram or Google account, such as your name, email, and profile picture. You can choose to stop sharing that information with us at any time by going to Facebook or Google to remove Flashcall’s access to that account and your ability to log in.

clients.title: Clients
clients.para1: A subscriber is someone who joins Flashcall’s platform to avail service provided by the consultant. You may have to make payment on our platform to avail the benefits or purchase any services offered by a consultant. We assure you that the payments get processed by most trusted third party payment gateways.
clients.para2: We collect and process information about the consultants you support, the level at which you support them, what benefits you receive and how often you support them. As a subscriber, if you select a benefit with a physical benefit, then you have to provide your shipping information so the consultant can ship you the benefit.

consultants.title: Consultants
consultants.para1: A consultant is someone who provides consultation for their clients through Flashcall’s platform. To become a Consultant, you must create a page (also called a consultant's personal website) that describes what you are creating and any benefits you are offering. To receive payouts you have to provide us your preferred payment mode with your details e.g. UPI / Bank Transfer etc.
consultants.para2: You must also provide us with additional information for tax purposes.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information We Collect
additionalInfo.para1: We collect information automatically as you navigate the site or through our third party analytics providers. We may store usage information such as the type of device you use to access Flashcall, your operating system, browser type, IP address, and device ID, the pages you visit or request, links clicked, referring sites, user interactions and your search terms. We also derive your location from your self-disclosed country, your IP address.
additionalInfo.para2: We also collect the information from your interaction with our platform in terms of user comments, services browsed etc.

infoUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
purposes: allow you to sign in to your account
allow you to join a consultant's membership program on Flashcall
send you emails relevant to your usage, as controlled by your email preferences
understand how you use the service and create better tools for consultants to serve subscribers
conduct research and development to improve Flashcall and develop future products
prevent fraud and abuse on Flashcall
ship merchandise to you if a benefit includes it
allow us to provide you with reasonable accommodation, if you notify us of a disability

infoSharing.title: Information Sharing
infoSharing.description: We share the sensitive personal information to any third party without obtaining the prior consent of the user in the following limited circumstances:
infoSharing.circumstances: When it is requested or required by law or by any court or governmental agency or authority to disclose, for the purpose of verification of identity, or for the prevention, detection, investigation including cyber incidents, or for prosecution and punishment of offences. These disclosures are made in good faith and belief that such disclosure is reasonably necessary for enforcing these Terms; for complying with the applicable laws and regulations.

infoShared.description: By becoming a subscriber of a consultant, you agree to have the following information shared with that consultant:
info: your name and other profile information you’ve provided
any messages you send consultants through Flashcall
some aggregated and anonymized data about how you use Flashcall that cannot be linked back to you or to any individual user
